_STACK_SIZE = DEFINED(_STACK_SIZE) ? _STACK_SIZE : 0x400;
_HEAP_SIZE = DEFINED(_HEAP_SIZE) ? _HEAP_SIZE : 0x800;
_HUGE_HEAP_SIZE = DEFINED(_HUGE_HEAP_SIZE) ? _HUGE_HEAP_SIZE : 0x200000;

/* Define Memories in the system */

MEMORY
{
   local_memory : ORIGIN = 0x50, LENGTH = 0x7FB0
   dram : ORIGIN = 0xC0000000, LENGTH = 0x40000000
}

/* Specify the default entry point to the program */

ENTRY(_start)

/* Define the sections, and where they are mapped in memory */

SECTIONS
{
.vectors.reset 0x0 : {
   KEEP (*(.vectors.reset))
} 

.vectors.sw_exception 0x8 : {
   KEEP (*(.vectors.sw_exception))
} 

.vectors.interrupt 0x10 : {
   KEEP (*(.vectors.interrupt))
} 

.vectors.hw_exception 0x20 : {
   KEEP (*(.vectors.hw_exception))
} 

.text : {
   *(.text)
   *(.text.*)
   *(.gnu.linkonce.t.*)
} > local_memory

.note.gnu.build-id : {
   KEEP (*(.note.gnu.build-id))
} > local_memory

.init : {
   KEEP (*(.init))
} > local_memory

.fini : {
   KEEP (*(.fini))
} > local_memory

.ctors : {
   __CTOR_LIST__ = .;
   ___CTORS_LIST___ = .;
   KEEP (*crtbegin.o(.ctors))
   KEEP (*(EXCLUDE_FILE(*crtend.o) .ctors))
   KEEP (*(SORT(.ctors.*)))
   KEEP (*(.ctors))
   __CTOR_END__ = .;
   ___CTORS_END___ = .;
} > local_memory

.dtors : {
   __DTOR_LIST__ = .;
   ___DTORS_LIST___ = .;
   KEEP (*crtbegin.o(.dtors))
   KEEP (*(EXCLUDE_FILE(*crtend.o) .dtors))
   KEEP (*(SORT(.dtors.*)))
   KEEP (*(.dtors))
   PROVIDE(__DTOR_END__ = .);
   PROVIDE(___DTORS_END___ = .);
} > local_memory

.rodata : {
   __rodata_start = .;
   *(.rodata)
   *(.rodata.*)
   *(.gnu.linkonce.r.*)
   __rodata_end = .;
} > local_memory

   . = ALIGN(8);
   __sdata2_start = .;
   *(.sdata2)
   *(.sdata2.*)
   *(.gnu.linkonce.s2.*)
   . = ALIGN(8);
   __sdata2_end = .;
} > local_memory

   *(.sbss2.*)

   __sbss2_end = .;
} > local_memory

.bss (NOLOAD) : {
   . = ALIGN(4);
   __bss_start = .;
   *(.bss)
   *(.bss.*)
   *(.gnu.linkonce.b.*)
   *(COMMON)
   . = ALIGN(4);
   __bss_end = .;
} > local_memory

_SDA_BASE_ = __sdata_start + ((__sbss_end - __sdata_start) / 2 );

_SDA2_BASE_ = __sdata2_start + ((__sbss2_end - __sdata2_start) / 2 );

/* Generate Stack and Heap definitions */

.heap (NOLOAD) : {
   . = ALIGN(8);
   _heap = .;
   _heap_start = .;
   . += _HEAP_SIZE;
   _heap_end = .;
} > local_memory

.stack (NOLOAD) : {
   _stack_end = .;
   . += _STACK_SIZE;
   . = ALIGN(8);
   _stack = .;
   __stack = _stack;
} > local_memory

.hugeheap (NOLOAD) :
	ALIGN(8)
{

	_huge_heap_start = .;
	. += _HUGE_HEAP_SIZE;
	_huge_heap_end = .;*/
	KEEP(*(.hugeheap))
} > dram

_end = .;
